review_comment: arrived today installed and happy pros really helpful in day today usage too many pockets capable in holding multiple items material is nice and fine won t disturb the passenger seating behind cons the straps are thin and very plasticy i e you may need to tighten it over a period of time you may need to re stitch a thicker one for better grip bottle holders are a little just a little below size which means when you put a 1 ltr bottle in it its tight hope it may loosen up in due time

review_comment: must buy thing fine quality

review_comment: quality of the material okphone pocket good for small mobile phones only difficult to fit in the current smartphones water bottle holders ok for 200 500ml bottles bigger ones not advisable for me the challenge was the black color strap provided to tie around the seat the strap is quite thin and small in length overall this is an ok product and basis your need you can buy it

product_name: ALLEXTREME PU Leather Auto Car Backseat Organizer for Kids Toy Bottles Storage with Foldable Dining Table Tray Holder Pocket Kick Mats (Beige)
review_title: don t get cheated by the misleading ratings
review_comment: the organiser is designed to suit any car thats the reason the product is so bad and has a lot of ergonomic issues 1 the strap runs right in the middle of the seat which will create huge back discomfort for the person who is sitting as they can t have proper back support pic attached 2 the bottle holders and tissue holder is jus kept for name sake you can point fit a 250ml bottle in the holder and the tissue holder is a joke pics attached 3 the stitching is not proper there s a lot of extra material in the foldable tray so if you think of placing a coffee tea mug or cup it wouldn t have a solid base and prepare to clean up the entire car after spillage pic attached 4 the ropes for the buckles are too short to reach around the seat the foldable tray s rope hardly reaches to the other end this will cause the rope to start tearing off the stitches from the skin overall a very bad product to order online you can get a customised one directly from shop 2 the ti

product_name: ALLEXTREME PU Leather Auto Car Backseat Organizer for Kids Toy Bottles Storage with Foldable Dining Table Tray Holder Pocket Kick Mats (Beige)
review_comment: purchased this product for my new car after seeing good response on amazon however product is made of quite poor quality of material 1 i ordered black colour looked good in picture but is very fragile and weak in reality 2 stitching is quite bad too the tray provided is just a cardboard wrapped in weak cloth won t be able to hold a bowl of fruits in case you thought to so 3 the pockets are equally weak may have strength of a hard paper at best they have used glue to join ends at many places you can imagine the strength you are going to get 4 the belt shown in picture is equally poor it s not a belt clip but the belt wrap around seems like someone generally freaking out as manufacturer purchasing reviews and luring customers in name of discount on otherwise inconceivably high prices verdict a cheap quality product with equally bad design that won t survive even a week of regular use not recommended at all
